CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar
at kitchen table Chi on Mot's lap book on table Chi's hands in lap

Chi reads along a little slowly and with a few errors; Mot has her hands full with younger brother; Mot asks Chi if she would still be hungry (after Friday's oranges); Mot tells Chi to sound it out when she pauses at sausage; Chi gets it by herself after that; in summary , Chi must have remarkable powers of concentration to survive this (BRO screams throughout). whispers from unknown speakers

u.a: tells Bro Chi is reading them a story; Bro climbs on Mot's lap
increases pitch to scream on last no
asks EXP if can give Bro some paper
there is a lot of commotion; talking and crying as Chi reads
BRO crying for whole line , screams no on overlap
BRO tugging on Chi's arm while she reads line
yes-no is an interchange between Bro and SIS2
